name: Occult Rewrite
description:
Gameplay Features!

  • Your good ending won't some so easily

    Thinking you can enter-key your way to victory? Think again!
    Occult Rewrite counts with an investigation style gameplay where you'll have to
    examine clues, gather evidence, talk to your classmates and discuss the situation
    in order to reach the truth!

  • Every story can be rewritten!

    Reach multiple extended endings reached by several different paths.
    Each route hiding key information to solve the mistery!

  • The island won't let their secrets be revealed that easily.

    Give in to the sweet allure of mystery!
    Gather evidence and solve puzzles or you risk being belittled by your classmates
    if you get basic logic wrong!
